item.description:
Wow it has been a long time I think this movie looks fantastic
I will email the time of the movie when it is posted on wed night

Also in order to keep this group going I will need the one time fee of $19.95
Please either send me a check or you can give it to me at the next event that you attend


only a handful of people have given this to me and there are a lot of start up costs

Hope to see you there
Kerry Skinner
cell: 508 868 0806
home: 508-329-1417
kerryskinner@marykay.com
www.marykay.com/kerryskinner

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: lake view terrace movie night out
